game.name: Fruit Escape Draw Line
game.description:
Do you want to improve your cognitive abilities? Are you among the ones for whom checking out physics-based puzzles is a great fun? If this is the case, checking out Fruit Escape Draw Line game is the best thing to do online. This cool and colorful physics drawing game allows you to train your brain and develop your problem-solving skills amazingly. Gear up to take an instant decision and solve all the puzzles to be the biggest player of this brand new arcade game!

Put your imaginations and wisdom to the test to become a master of this HTML5 fun drawing game! This fruit has fed up with their boring routine and now it wants to escape from the kitchen. Your mission in this mind game is to guide this fruit to find the way to escape from the kitchen before the worst happens to it. Use your mouse in PC or tap the screen on mobile phone to draw an escape route for it! Do not forget to avoid running out of ink to grab an extra start to boost score and clear level.

Make sure to keep your eyes on the collectible along the way to grab the second star. Your successful effort will ensure you to clear the level to grab your final star. There are 24 unique and exciting levels to play through and 8 unique achievements to grab in this cool physics game. Be creative and challenge your logical thinking in our mobile puzzle games for boys and girls and have fun without download on atmegame.com!
